thread.title: Cameron Crowe's Roadies has been picked up to series by Showtime - US TV
thread.title_full: Cameron Crowe's Roadies has been picked up to series by Showtime - US TV News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Cameron Crowe's Roadies has been picked up to series by Showtime - US TV
text: Cameron Crowe comedy Roadies has been ordered to series by Showtime.The Almost Famous director celebrated the 10-episode pickup on Twitter, before sharing a video teaser of the show.Roadies centres on the rigours of being a stadium rock band's road crew, who live for music and the de facto family they've formed along the way.JJ Abrams, Winnie Holzman and Bryan Burke are among the executive producers on the ensemble project."I've long wanted to work with JJ and Winnie, and coming together to tell these stories has been beyond a blast," Crowe said. Â© Showtime "The actors are all so passionate about music too, and the whole show has the feeling of stories and music shared between friends. We can't wait to bring it all to life in 2016."Luke Wilson, Imogen Poots, Carla Gugino, Rafe Spall, Keisha Castle-Hughes, Peter Cambor, Machine Gun Kelly and Ron White star.
